answerText: Les Liaisons Dangereuses [or The Dangerous Liasions][10] This Bastille inmate wrote about a young girl who is brought up at a monastery, where she is forced to participate in orgies with monks, in his novel Justine.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 18 | 15 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: For 10 points each, answer the following about notoriously obscene French novels. [10] The young girl Cecile Volanges is raped by her music teacher in this novel about a perverse contest of debauchery between the Marquise de Merteuil and the Vicomte de Valmont.
